entry.title: Sanctuary4All ColoradoSanctuary4All ColoradoThank you for all the support you have given us with the solidarity meals program during this...
entry.content:
Sanctuary4All ColoradoSanctuary4All Colorado

Thank you for all the support you have given us with the solidarity meals program during this year and 3 months, we inform you that we are in the process of cha...nging direction and that is why this week we will not have food because we are planning the inauguration of the new place . On August 21, follow us to find out about the event, and continue supporting the families. Thanks a lot

entry.title: Sanctuary4All Colorado updated their profile picture.
entry.content: Sanctuary4All Colorado updated their profile picture.

entry.title: Thank you for all the support you have given us with the...
entry.content:
Sanctuary4All Colorado

Thank you for all the support you have given us with the solidarity meals program during this year and 3 months, we inform you that we are in the process of changing direction and that is why this week we will not have food because we are planning the inauguration of the new place . On August 21, follow us to find out about the event, and continue supporting the families. Thanks a lot

entry.title: We‚Äôre moving locations for Solidarity Meals soon, and as a...
entry.content:
Sanctuary4All Colorado is in Denver, Colorado.

We‚Äôre moving locations for Solidarity Meals soon, and as a show of thanks for the space that the First Unitarian Society of Denver has provided us over the last year, this week‚Äôs sale is raising money for the church. You can support by ordering flautas at https://solidaritymeals.paperform.co.

entry.title: Tania is selling enchiladas again, and according to Laszlo, they...
entry.content:
Sanctuary4All Colorado is in Denver, Colorado.

Tania is selling enchiladas again, and according to Laszlo, they come with the best of all possible rices. Place your order today at https://solidaritymeals.paperform.co. Pickup is on Saturday, July 31, in capitol hill.

entry.title: Tania is selling enchiladas this weekend! There will also be...
entry.content:
Sanctuary4All Colorado is in Denver, Colorado.

Tania is selling enchiladas this weekend! There will also be agua fresca and dessert for sale at pickup. You can place your order at https://solidaritymeals.paperform.co.

entry.title: Tania is selling enchiladas this weekend to raise money for her...
entry.content:
Sanctuary4All Colorado is in Denver, Colorado.

Tania is selling enchiladas this weekend to raise money for her residency so that she can stay in the U.S. with her parents, husband, children, and extended family. You can support by ordering enchiladas from her this weekend at https://solidaritymeals.paperform.co

entry.title: Sanctuary4All ColoradoTyler Borkowskihttps://youtu.be/39WVAtzGME0 Howdy Ya'll! I recently directed a documentary with Sanctuary4All Colorado...
entry.content:
Sanctuary4All ColoradoTyler Borkowski

https://youtu.be/39WVAtzGME0
Howdy Ya'll! I recently directed a documentary with Sanctuary4All Colorado about their Solidarity Meals program. This program is ru...n by renowned Denver based activist Jeanette Vizguerra, and they cook meals to raise money for undocumented families facing deportation.
It would mean the world to me if you watched it.
